397: func (cha *ClickHouseAnalytics) GetConversationTrends(ctx context.Context, interval string, periods int) ([]map[string]interface{}, error) {
398: 	query := fmt.Sprintf(`
399: 		SELECT
400: 			toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 1 %s) as period_start,
401: 			COUNT(*) as total_conversations,
402: 			AVG(message_count) as avg_messages,
403: 			AVG(entity_count) as avg_entities,
404: 			AVG(total_tokens) as avg_tokens,
405: 			AVG(duration_ms) as avg_duration_ms,
406: 			AVG(debate_rounds) as avg_debate_rounds
407: 		FROM conversation_metrics
408: 		WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL ? %s
409: 		GROUP BY period_start
410: 		ORDER BY period_start DESC
411: 		LIMIT ?
412: 	`, interval, interval)

263: 	query := fmt.Sprintf(`
264: 		SELECT
265: 			provider,
266: 			toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 1 %s) as period_start,
267: 			COUNT(*) as total_requests,
268: 			AVG(response_time_ms) as avg_response_time,
269: 			quantile(0.95)(response_time_ms) as p95_response_time,
270: 			quantile(0.99)(response_time_ms) as p99_response_time,
271: 			AVG(confidence_score) as avg_confidence,
272: 			SUM(tokens_used) as total_tokens,

274: 			AVG(error_count) as error_rate,

276: 		FROM debate_metrics
